text:
Blackboard is hiring a Senior Systems Engineer to join our Open Source Technology Operations Team. The Open Source Technology Operations team is responsible for delivering eLearning services to over a thousand clients comprising almost 4 million users worldwide and includes support, administration and client liaison. A passion for technology and the desire to “do it once, do it right” underpin the culture of the team.

http://chc.tbe.taleo.net/chc01/ats/careers/requisition.jsp?o...
